titleStmt.title: The word of the Lord God Almighty that liveth for ever, and ever, to all persecutors, who are dead, though yet alive, upon the face of the whole earth: that so they may hear, fear, and repent, before it be too late.
titleStmt.author: West, Thomas, of Hertford.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Tho. West. Written in my prison, the 16th. of the 5th. month, commonly called July, in the year of the Lord, 1664. This was first written in the year, 1663. and is now given forth to be published all abroad through the nations of the earth, as the Lord makes way for it.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
